page.title: 12FARMING OWERSBY GOATS
page.content: The goats are pedigree Anglo-Nubian and they win consistently at shows. The herd usually consists of 2 stud males,4-6 milkers,3 goatlings from 1-2yrs.old and 3 kids from 0 to 1yr. The milk is used for rearing kids,for home use and sold deep-frozen for yog- hurt making and human consumption. Stock is sold for breeding at home and world-wide. Surplus male kids are reared for meat. The goats live in a large warm wooden shed divided into pens with a feed and milking area at one end.Water and electricity are laid on in the shed. The goats are housed all winter but in summer go out to graze in paddocks. The goats are fed a coarse mix of con- centrates made up of rolled barley and oats,flaked maize,fishmeal & minerals They also eat hay,barley and pea straw and root-crops and greens in season.
